name: YouTube :: Red n Dark Theme. Deep Black Style.
description:
YouTube :: Red 'n Dark Theme :: Black Style :: No sign in required

A working Dark YouTube style with the original red.

• No image ADS (images) and some new text ads (2020)
• Initially designed for those who never sign-in (not giving away their information)
• Easy on the eyes
• Continuous development
• Always ON  (to avoid switch to dark every time you enter YouTube)

Included the **COVID-19 / Coronavirus** notification banner in the theme. Sorry but I think that this banner is important and won't be removed.

Any questions / issues / bugs / suggestions, write in comments below with a description. 
Education is always appreciated. 
Visit my other styles if you wish.

THANKS FOR 1400+ DOWNLOADS! ENJOY!!

user.name: rash!
user.about: Engineer. Audio & Video editor. Voice over artist.
